name: Artemis' Labyrinth
description:
“Artemis’ Labyrinth” is a single player mazerunner, based on Artemis the Greek goddess of the hunt. The purpose of this game is to safely exit the maze, without being killed by the enemy. You can shot enemies, but beware! Once your mana is out, you can't continue to defend yourself.

The maze is filled with goodies that can help you! Goodluck!

Controls:
Movement (Up and Down Arrow/W&S)
Rotation (Left and Right Arrow/A&D)
Aim (Mouse)
Shoot (Left Mouse Button)

Music: Haven by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com) Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License 
Music: Voice of an Angel by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com) Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License
